message.body: Are you around the 20th during the day?
I am at Dive studio that day making an HDCAM transfer. Not sure what time I will be done!
I haven't seen you in so long! Are you headed out of town for the holidays?
I know! This month has been really packed because of grading and finals at uarts. I'm gonna be around til jan 2 and then gone for all if January!
Grades are due the 18th so after that I have a break
And... I quit penn officially leaving the 23rd.
Ok - let me know when you are available after the 23rd
Thanks! Yeah I'm feeling really good about the decision. My mom and sister are here 24-27th but maybe the weekend of the 21st we can have a studio day!
That's sweet that they are visiting you - I may go away the 20th at night to 23. But maybe after the 27?
We need to find a time!
Are you filming them at all while they are here?
I am free all of the 28th, 29th 30th 31st so we will make it happen.
Gonna be an pretty ridiculous adventure.
Great! I will check my planer and we will make it happen!
Let me know if you need any support in filming while they are here
